snippet.title: Pacer: Classic Trailer
snippet.description:
Immerse yourself in Pacer: Classic, an adrenaline-fueled anti-gravity racing game set in a vast, interconnected universe. Personalize your paceship and weapons, engage in a riveting campaign, or single-player races, or even face off against your foes in a dynamic online multiplayer race within the expansive PacerVerse.

Learn more:
https://ltgverse.com/game/pacer-classic

Join our Discord server to stay tuned:
https://discord.gg/FymBdSh9uf

Join us on social media:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PacerVerse/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PacerVerse
